main event: Air Force officers observed a spherical red object with a blue flame trail flying straight and level over Lake Charles, Louisiana, on August 2, 1952.
interesting points: The observation lasted only 3-4 seconds,There were two Air Force officers as witnesses,The reported object had a blue flame trail,There were comments that the source of the observation was inexperienced,The object was not identified, and no physical evidence was recovered.
sighted object: spherical red object with a blue flame trail
